product_overview: Community Car MVC is a premium, feature-rich online platform tailored for car enthusiasts to connect, share knowledge, and participate in their automotive passions through a variety of community and real-time interactive features.
core_goals: Provide a comprehensive community Q&A system for users to ask, answer, vote, and bookmark questions related to cars.
Enable user registration, authentication, and personal account management to create a secure and personalized experience.
Offer a centralized user dashboard that summarizes user activity and platform statistics.
Facilitate real-time interactions such as notifications, chat, and content engagement via SignalR.
Integrate an AI assistant powered by Google Gemini and Hugging Face to enhance user support and interaction.
Support multilingual experience with full localization including right-to-left language support for Arabic.
Enable community engagement through posts, stories, groups, events, and discovery via maps and points of interest.
key_features: Community Q&A system with capabilities to ask, answer, vote, and bookmark questions, including real-time updates.
User authentication module for secure registration, login, and account management.
Dashboard for users showing overview and personal statistics.
Real-time notifications and private localized chat using SignalR for seamless user interaction.
Posts & Stories feature allowing users to share their automotive journey with temporary and permanent content.
Groups & Events management enabling users to join car enthusiast groups and participate in meetups.
Integrated maps and points of interest discovery for car-friendly locations and tracks.
AI-powered assistant with an interactive chat widget styled with glassmorphism for smart responsiveness.
Full platform localization supporting English and Arabic, including dashboard-managed translation controls.
user_flow_summary: Users register or log into their accounts via the authentication system.
Authenticated users access a personalized dashboard showing their activity summary and stats.
Users navigate to the community Q&A section to ask new questions or browse and answer existing ones, with real-time updates.
Users engage in posts and stories sharing, as well as join groups and participate in car meet events.
Real-time notifications and messages appear via SignalR-powered chat enabling instant interactions.
Users interact with the AI assistant for support, information, or guided assistance through an interactive chat widget.
Multilingual users can switch languages and experience the platform with proper localization and right-to-left support for Arabic.
validation_criteria: The community Q&A system must allow users to ask, answer, upvote/downvote, and bookmark questions and answers seamlessly with real-time syncing.
User authentication must securely handle user registration, login, and account management with proper validation and session control.
Dashboard data must be accurately and timely displayed for each user, reflecting their interactions and statistics.
SignalR real-time notifications and chat must provide instant and reliable communication without lag.
Posts, stories, groups, and event features must function without errors and support content creation, joining, and interaction.
The AI assistant must respond appropriately to user queries and function correctly within the chat widget interface.
Localization must fully support English and Arabic with proper text direction, and translators should be able to manage translations dynamically through the admin dashboard.
